title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: We're looking for a Senior Frontend Developer with expertise in modern JavaScript frameworks to lead the UI development of scalable web applications.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in frontend development
Strong proficiency in React, TypeScript, and modern JS tooling
Experience with performance optimization and accessibility
Ability to lead and mentor junior developers

title: UI/UX Designer
description: We are seeking a UI/UX Designer to craft intuitive, user-centered digital experiences from wireframes to high-fidelity designs.
requirements: 3+ years of UI/UX design experience
Proficiency in Figma, Adobe XD or Sketch
Strong understanding of user-centered design principles
Experience conducting user research and usability testing

title: Backend Engineer (Node.js)
description: Join our team as a Backend Engineer focused on building scalable REST APIs and microservices using Node.js.
requirements: 3+ years of experience with Node.js and Express
Understanding of database systems like MongoDB or PostgreSQL
Experience with API design and authentication (OAuth/JWT)
Knowledge of Docker and microservices architecture

title: Graphic Designer
description: We're hiring a creative Graphic Designer to create engaging visuals for digital and print media.
requirements: 2+ years of experience in graphic design
Proficiency in Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, and InDesign
Strong visual and conceptual skills
Experience designing for social media and marketing

title: Full Stack Developer (React/Python)
description: We're looking for a Full Stack Developer who can work across the stack using React for frontend and Python (Django/Flask) for backend.
requirements: 4+ years of experience in full stack development
Strong skills in React, HTML/CSS, and JavaScript
Backend experience with Django or Flask
Understanding of RESTful APIs and modern CI/CD practices

title: Mobile App Developer (React Native)
description: We are hiring a Mobile App Developer to build high-quality cross-platform apps using React Native.
requirements: 3+ years of experience with React Native
Strong understanding of mobile UI/UX principles
Experience with Redux and mobile API integration
Ability to publish and maintain apps in Play Store and App Store

title: Web Designer
description: We're looking for a Web Designer to create responsive and visually appealing website layouts and landing pages.
requirements: 2+ years of web design experience
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and design tools like Figma
Understanding of responsive and mobile-first design
Basic knowledge of WordPress or Webflow is a plus

title: DevOps Engineer
description: We are seeking a DevOps Engineer to help scale and automate our infrastructure for high availability and performance.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in DevOps or SRE roles
Proficiency in Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
Strong scripting skills in Bash or Python

title: Frontend Developer (Vue.js)
description: Join us as a Frontend Developer to build engaging user interfaces using Vue.js and modern web technologies.
requirements: 2+ years of experience with Vue.js
Solid understanding of HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript
Experience working with Vuex and component libraries
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and Git workflows

title: Product Designer (UX Research)
description: We are looking for a Product Designer with strong UX research skills to create user-first design solutions informed by data.
requirements: 3+ years in product or UX design roles
Strong portfolio demonstrating user research and UX flows
Experience with A/B testing and usability studies
Skilled in tools like Figma, Miro, and usability testing platforms
